nodes.text: Conflict and Mastery is an article written by August Hahn and Cynthia Hahn as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on March 11, 2004 and form of a meeting of the Almas Academy leadership with Darrus Jeht who delivered orders from the Jedi Council moving all non-essential staff of the rank of Jedi Knight into active duty in the Clone Wars.
